name: Frogger Baron
description:
You are the  Frogger Baron

Many mistake you for some normal, boring frog. Especially those pesky flies. They've gone and made you mad for the last time. Always buzzing away and never becoming your tasty snack as they should. 

Jokes on them though!!!

They don't know that your grandfather taught you how to fly his ancient (but somehow still functional) biplane. 

So Take to the Skies

Stake your revenge on those pesky insects and shoot as many as you can before you inevitably run out of fuel.  But be careful. In these old planes, even the bullet cost fuel.

Controls: Use W/S and Up/Down arrows to control the plane and space to shoot

Press escape to return to the main menu.

*Created for Mini Jam 106*

*Time limitation with fuel gauge that will inevitably run out due to bug damage, time, or bullet use*

*You are a frog in a plane*
